text:
While fans of the Courtneys continued to wait for a followup to their 2017 album, The Courtneys II, the Vancouver trio made a stop at the 2019 CBC Music Festival at Toronto's Echo Beach back in May.

Performing songs from their first two albums, the reverb-drenched pop-rock tunes were the perfect way to kick off the summer music festival season, delighting the crowd at the festival's q stage.

If you missed out on their performance, you can watch it all in the video clips below. You can also catch up on all CBC Music Festival coverage, including full sets from other performers Alvvays, Stars, Buffy Sainte-Marie, Exco Levi and more, here.

description: The Vancouver trio delighted the crowd at the festival's q stage.
